title: An error occurred
TAURI_NOT_AVAILABLE: Tauri API is not available. Please run in desktop app.

errorBoundary.title: An unexpected error occurred
errorBoundary.subtitle: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try the following methods to resolve the issue.
errorBoundary.reportDescription: If this error occurs repeatedly, please report it to the following email:
troubleshootingSteps: Try completely closing and restarting the app
Check if the latest version of Claude Code History Viewer is installed
Try opening a different project to see if the problem persists
If the problem continues, copy the error information and report it to the developer
errorBoundary.emailBody:
Hello,

The following error occurred while using Claude Code History Viewer:

[Please paste the copied error information here]

Additional Information:
- What were you doing when the error occurred?
- Does the error occur repeatedly?
- Other notes:

Thank you.
